meanings.definition: The fact or condition of being a candidate.
meanings.sent1: Her candidacies for student council were well-received by her classmates.
meanings.sent2: The school had many candidacies for the position of class president.
meanings.sent3: His multiple candidacies for different roles made him a popular choice among voters.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, candidacies can be both exciting and challenging.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of candidacies in the election brought a sense of democracy to the process.

meanings.definition: The position or status of being a candidate.
meanings.sent1: After announcing her candidacy, she began campaigning in earnest.
meanings.sent2: The candidacies for the job were all highly qualified.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected withdrawal of his candidacy left the race wide open.
meanings.sent4: His successful candidacy for mayor was a result of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The competitiveness of the candidacies added excitement to the election.
